pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========Django Belt===========Simple package with some utilities for Django... image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-belt :target: https://pypi.org/project/django-belt/ :alt: PyPI.. image:: https://codecov.io/gh/marcosgabarda/django-belt/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=ZGLEIQ0ODW :target: https://codecov.io/gh/marcosgabarda/django-belt.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/code_style-black-000000.svg :target: https://github.com/ambv/black.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/django-belt/badge/?version=latest :target: https://django-belt.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest :alt: Documentation StatusQuick start-----------**1** Install using pip:: pip install django-belt**2** Add "belt" to your INSTALLED_APPS settings like this:: INSTALLED_APPS += ('belt',)
